Content.contentText: Hi there! I am Sem Pruijs and I love music, art, science and technology. I like making games, playing around with Arduino's and improving my software engineering skills. I am also interested in aerospace engineering and my dream is to go to mars.

You will be able to see all my projects here in the future. I am currently working on Flyght. Which is a local multiplayer fly fight game designed for tablets. It will be added someday. You can always visit my GitHub to see some of my projects if you cannot wait.
Flyght, a local multiplayer Fly fight game designed for tablets.
Relaxed Legs, a trash mobile game with ads. This is a test if I can make a trash mobile game in a short periode of time.
sempruijs.nl, this website. still in progress.
If you want to play a game that I have made.
Wosta is an iOS game that I have made in collaboration with my dad.
OneHourGameJam is a game jam where you have to make a game in one hour. I participate in this game jam almost every week. So there is always something fresh to play on my account :)
Parallel Worlds is a game that I have made in 7 days for the HighPixelGameJam on itch.io.
If you want to collaborate with me, a game jam for example. You can send an e-mail to sem@pruijs.nl
